title: email program
content: I inadvertently deleted my email program..................is there any possible way to get it back?
creator: gjm313127

title: Clicking links in emails fails to open the link in browser
content:
My Thunderbird was just updated to 102.8.0 (32-bit). Now when I click a hyperlink in an email, nothing happens. Well almost nothing happens. What does happen is that the top row of the window goes from blue to gray.

I looked into Settings and Account Settings to see if I could remedy this problem - I didn't find anything.

Help!
creator: jerrytex49

title: import sottocartelle hotmail.com
content:
Ho scaricato le mail dall'account hotmail.com ma non ha importato né mantenuto le sottocartelle. Potete aiutarmi a risolvere il problema, per favore?

Grazie, D.
creator: ddanglari

title: Can't send Thunderbird email since downloading new version!
content:
Email won't send since downloading new version. I've checked all SMTP settings and they are correct. IMAP settings are correct as well. What's going on? I get the following error message:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail: Unable to establish a secure link with Outgoing server (SMTP) iris.nau.edu using STARTTLS since it doesn't advertise that feature. Switch off STARTTLS for that server or contact your service provider.
creator: larry.stevens

title: SMTP problem Thunderbird
content: Thunderbird smtp cannot connect to outgoing server, error msg: Login to server smtp.***********.com with username ********* failed. Sending of the message failed. Unable to authenticate to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.**********.com. Please check the password and verify the 'Authentication method' in 'Account Settings outgoing server (SMTP)'. I changed nothing; suddenly it doesn't like my user name or password. This started suddenly on March 3. Need help. Thank you.
creator: user145321334100461922162074069276539069463

title: SSL Version Problem in accessing Inbox
content:
I have been unable to access new messages on an IMAP server for the past several days. A log entry from a test in the past hour shows as:

Mar 5 13:20:10 mail imapd-ssl: couriertls: connect: error:1408F10B:SSL routines:SSL3_GET_RECORD:wrong version number

I just created a Firefox login which required a confirmation code. Much to my surprise, I was able to retrieve this code from the inbox that was creating the problems.

Is there anything you can suggest based on the server log entry above?

Michael
creator: msilbert

title: CALDAV Calendar not displaying events (but will create them)
content:
I have a CalDAV Calendar server setup (iRedMail which uses SOGo (5.5.1) for my calendar events and contacts.

Some time ago, Thunderbird stopped displaying events from the online CALDAV Calendars. I have the same calendar subscribed as a .ics calendar, and I can see the events.

The same calendar works 4.0 on my Android Phone, so I know the server is working fine.

Recently, I've tried to troubleshoot this again with Thunderbird 102.8.0 64 bit on Ubuntu 22.10 with TBSync and Caldav provider extensions enabled.

In the attached image you can see the green ICS events from the calendar, but the blue (editable) versions are not visible.
creator: alan158

title: I downloaded K-9 Mail to my cellphone; ; now thunderbird no longer receives emails on my computer
content: Yesterday I downloaded K-9 Mail to my cellphone and am getting emails there. However, today Thunderbird no longer receives emails (from Comcast) on my computer. What has gone wrong?

content:
Incoming email works fine but when trying to send an email it doesn't work. Gives attached error message.

I have also attached my outgoing SMTP settings.

I have reset my password (i'm using an app password from hotmail) I have added thunderbird as an allowed app in Windows Defender

Using Windows 11. Version 10.0.22621 Build 22621

My gmail account works fine sending and receiving

title: Synchronization and Storage option is missing
content: I am running Thunderbird 102.8.0. The Synchronization and Storage option is missing from the Account Settings options list on each of my e-mail accounts. How to I access message retention policies for each account?

title: Unable to send Emails from mulitple accounts
content: Unable to send Emails from mulitple accounts in Thunderbird. Checking the SMTP it tells me the accounts look ok. The only difference was my TPG account uses port 25. The 3 Google accounts use ort 465.

title: EML file will not open
content:
Hi all,

I have been sent an eml file and it will not open by double clicking in Tbird. It works fine in Windows Live Mail and Win 10 Mail.

How do I fix this?

Regards,

Steve
creator: OzSteveC

title: UNIRE, SU un unico PC, la posta presente su due diversi PC
content: Ho installato mozilla su due miei pc (A e B) che per anni hanno scaricano, entrambi, la posta in arrivo dai tre miei diversi account (tiscali - aliceposta e gmail). Essendo due PC (win 10) nati in periodi diversi, contengono ovviamente posta, cartelle, ecc. di diverso contenuto. Ora dovendo eliminare uno dei due PC (il B) dovrei però copiare tutta sua la posta (sue cartelle, sottocartelle, ecc.) sul superstite (A) in modo che nel Mozilla di quest'ultimo possa trovare tutta la posta di entrambi (con cartelle, sottocartelle, ecc.). Mi potete aiutare? Grazie davvero Mario Delfitto - --RIMOSSO--@tiscali.it
creator: delmari

title: Importing a Mailing list
content:
I tried importing a mailing list (a csv file) of almost 200 addresses but it dumped all the individual addresses into my personal address book. Now I'm searching through my address book and deleting them. About 170 more to go.

I want the imported addresses to go directly into a mailing list, such as "Memberships". When I type "Memberships" in the "To:" field, the email will be sent to every address in the Memberships mailing list. Is there a way to import addresses into a mailing list without having to enter each address into the mailing list?

David
creator: David12846

title: The RETR command did not succeed. Error retrieving a message. Mail server mail.comcast.net responded: Message 8581 expunged.
content: The RETR command did not succeed. Error retrieving a message. Mail server mail.comcast.net responded: Message 8581 expunged.
creator: darkmoon1947

title: Not able to send email for outlook account using thunderbird. Can Receive Email
content:
I am using thunderbird 102.8.0 version on endeavourOS linux. I am facing issue in sending email for my outlook personal account using thunderbird. The outgoing server settings are listed below Server - outlook.office365.com Security - SS/TLS Authorisation - Oauth2 Port 465 userid - my email Id

I have tried with following security settings but it does not work. I can send and receive email for this accoutn using gmail app on android. Security - StartTLS Authorisation - normal password Port 587

I have tried even a combination of above security settings but it still does not work
creator: ajaychat3
